*Registration for this workshop is now closed*.

If you missed it, but would like to attend a future workshop, please reach out to [Eliot](../bios/community/aaaeliot.qmd) or
[Ceres](../bios/community/aaaeliot.qmd) so that we can add you to the wait list.

## Date: June 11 - 13, 2024

## Location: Virtual with MS Teams

Meeting link will be e-mailed to all workshop participants.

## Agenda

"WOYO", Work On Your Own + health breaks

In each session you will have time to work through the examples and take breaks. We will be monitoring the chat the entire WOYO period, responding to
questions. Plus, the last 15min of each WOYO will be with "open video and chat" to ask questions and discuss as a group. Where appropriate, we can
jump into video earlier for discussion.

All times in Pacific Daylight Time (GMT-7)

Presentation slides will be added at the end of each day.
